_description: Laurence Minot, ‘The Siege of Tournay’ — six 8-line (abababab) and three 11-line (ababababcab) stanzas

BlCottGalEIX.First Lines:
Towrenay ȝow has tightto timber trey and
                    tene…
BlCottGalEIX.Last Lines:
…god grante him graces godeand fro all sins vs
                    saue
BlCottGalEIX.Note:
Ends ‘Amen’ at end of last line, f.
                    54va.
BlCottGalEIX.Attributed Title:
Herknis how king Edward lay / With his men bifor tournay (rubric couplet
                    heading by scribe, f. 54rb)
